title: Clinical trial enrollment and consent
dataVerified: Participant name (coded), investigator, trial ID, consent details
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Consent status (verified/active/withdrawn). Link to trial sponsor system (investigators and regulators, requires authentication)
rationale: FDA regulatory compliance. Domain binding verifies trial sponsor. Prevents fabricated consent forms. Long retention requirement. Human subject protection. Uses SHA-512 (medical privacy).
